name: Bend with the Wind
text: Meditation allows you to regulate your body temperature, heart rate, and other attributes to resist the elements.
prerequisites: Wis 15, Body Control, Endurance, Meditation Master.
benefit: For 24 hours after you meditate, you gain cold resistance 5 and fire resistance 5.
text_zh: 冥想会允许你调节你的体温，心率和其他身体机能来抵抗元素
prerequisites_zh: 感知15，身体制御，坚忍，冥想大师。
benefit_zh: 在你冥想后的24小时内，你获得寒冷抗力5和火焰抗力5。
